nodes.documentation:
@dev This methods disables most of the operations for a given game.
Games can be deactivated without being removed, in case an issue is detected.
Deactivation keeps all related data safe while it reduces the operations available to authorised accounts.

     * @param _gameId The id of the game to deactivate

devdoc.details: This contract is as a game factory and acts as a proxy between players and games. Operations related to the game will be delegated to the appropriate game instance.  * There is a circuit breaker implemented that can only be operated by the owner account, in case a serious issue is detected.

activateGame(uint256).details: This methods enables all operations for a given game. Games can be deactivated without being removed, in case an issue is detected.

params._gameId: The id of the game to activate

constructor.details: Public constructor that registers a game at creation. The game is represented by the account of the game creator, a name and the cost of playing a match.     * A registration event is emitted if the creation is successful.

deactivateGame(uint256).details: This methods disables most of the operations for a given game. Games can be deactivated without being removed, in case an issue is detected. Deactivation keeps all related data safe while it reduces the operations available to authorised accounts.

params._gameId: The id of the game to deactivate

getGameMatchScore(uint256).details: This method looks up caller's available matches (those that are not in played status) and returns the total number.
getGameMatchScore(uint256).return: The total number of matches for the caller that are not in played status

getNumberOfAvailableMatches(uint256).details: This method looks up caller's available matches (those that are not in played status) and returns the total number.
getNumberOfAvailableMatches(uint256).return: The total number of matches for the caller that are not in played status

getRecordEntryAddress(uint256,uint256).details: Method that retrieves the top 10 ranking one piece of data at a time,  to avoid complex operations on-chain.
getRecordEntryAddress(uint256,uint256).return: The address of the entry in the top 10 'pos' position

getRecordEntryScore(uint256,uint256).details: Method that retrieves the top 10 ranking one piece of data at a time,  to avoid complex operations on-chain.
getRecordEntryScore(uint256,uint256).return: The score of the entry in the top 10 'pos' position

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

matchPlayed(uint256,uint256).details: This method is a proxy to the game method that stores the score of a match played,  calculates whether it falls in the top 10 in which case it also calculates and awards a number of shares to the player. How many depends on the position achieved.     * The method emits a match finished event and a new record one in case the score deserves it.
matchPlayed(uint256,uint256).return: The number of shares produced by the score (zero if the score doesn't make it to the top 10)

matchPrice(uint256).details: Locates the price of a given game.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Called by a pauser to pause, triggers stopped state.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

playMatch(uint256).details: This method flags a match as played, which consumes it. The status of the match becomes Played so its score can be associated to it.
playMatch(uint256).return: The ID of the match started

playerBalance(uint256).details: This method is a proxy to the game method that retrieves caller's number of shares in the common game pot.

purchaseMatch(uint256).details: This method enables the purchase of game matches. The cost of the game is the price that the game owner defined at creation. The operation is relayed to the game contract for completion.     * If the purchase is successful a game purchased event is emitted.

params._gameId: The id of the game to deactivate

purchaseMatch(uint256).return: The ID of the match purchased

registerGame(string,address,uint256).details: Method to register a new game to the platform.      *  Emits a game registration event if sucessful.

releaseReward(uint256,address).details: This method is a proxy to the game pull method that retrieves the balance for a player.     * The method emits a reward released event.
releaseReward(uint256,address).return: True if player's balance is released successfully

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state.

devdoc.title: CryptoArcade
